name: Agony (itch) (Bardon)
description:
You love to play Baseball with your friends. But on the next day your bat is away. It lies somewhere in the lands of Agony.

Is it a dream/nightmare or is it reality?

But one thing is for sure: You wanna back your lovely bat!

(the inventory, your items, are at the top of the screen. When you want for example to give something to somebody, go to the person and click on the item. Then make double-click on 'give')
